column5: This MSc will give you advanced knowledge and skills in conservation biology.Our campus is in the Brighton and Lewes Downs UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, and surrounded by the South Downs National Park. Here you’ll gain an advanced, global outlook on conservation and will be ready to help solve the challenges of change in the modern world.Learn about the positive approaches conservation biologists use to address conservation challenges, and have the chance to take part in unique research in the field.
